chunks.text:
Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:59:26
Folder: CAJV008 - urgent- moe- trade license, property all risks (par) & public liability insurance certificates and
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CAJV008_00
From: Ramez Zebdie <Ramez.Zebdie@chalhoub.com>
To: Salwa Al Mamari <Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com>; Sharon Pinto <Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; Government Affairs <Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-30 14:50
Subject: URGENT- MOE- Trade License, Property All Risks (PAR) & Public Liability Insurance Certificates and Storage Insurance Certificate
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Team,

 

Please find below email Memo from MAF management team for your information and action if needed.

 

Best Regards,

Ramez Zebdie

 

________________________________

Dear Retailer,

 

You are requested to submit below valid documents of your store for Mall of The Emirates as part of your obligation towards the lease agreement with Majid Al Futtaim Properties LLC on a yearly basis without reminders.

 

1.	Trade License, 
2.	Property All Risks (PAR)
3.	Public Liability Insurance Certificates 
4.	Storage Insurance Certificate (Only required if there is a storage unit)

 

Kindly send the copies to reception.moe@maf.ae <mailto:reception.moe@maf.ae>  or submit physical copies to the reception at the Mall Management office, MOE.

 

We would appreciate your urgent attention to this and look forward to receiving the updated documents immediately (before 06/11/2024).
